Name: Woody cocktail
Instructions: MUDDLE mint in base of stirring glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Named not after the cheery chap in Cheers or even the Beatlesâ€™ Norwegian Wood but due to this particularly Woody cocktail containing birch water and mastiha.
History: Created in August 2015 by yours truly (Simon Difford) at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
